SELECT TRUNC(t.vest_date, 'mm') vest_date, t.ismg_id, sum(t.cmcc_delv) cmcc_delv, sum(t.cmcc_undelv) cmcc_undelv, sum(t.cu_delv) cu_delv, sum(t.cu_undelv) cu_undelv, sum(t.ct_delv) ct_delv, sum(t.ct_undelv) ct_undelv FROM SMSMAN.PM_RECEIPT t INNER JOIN ext_channel_resource c ON c.ismg_id = t.ismg_id
and t.ismg_id = #{receipt.ismgId}
and t.vest_date >= to_date(#{receipt.beginDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
and t.vest_date < to_date(#{receipt.endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')+1
GROUP BY TRUNC(t.vest_date, 'mm'), t.ismg_id ORDER BY TRUNC(t.vest_date, 'mm'), t.ismg_id

SELECT TRUNC(t.vest_date, 'mm') vest_date, cast(SUM((t.cmcc_delv + t.cu_delv + t.ct_delv) * s.unit_price) AS NUMBER(18,2)) settle FROM SMSMAN.PM_RECEIPT t INNER JOIN ext_channel_resource c ON c.ismg_id = t.ismg_id INNER JOIN ext_quote_detail s ON s.channel_id = c.id
and t.vest_date >= to_date(#{receipt.beginDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
and t.vest_date < to_date(#{receipt.endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')+1
GROUP BY TRUNC(t.vest_date, 'mm') ORDER BY TRUNC(t.vest_date, 'mm')
